entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
